General.Name: Oxford Technology 2 Venture Capital Trust plc
General.Description: Oxford Technology 2 Venture Capital Trust plc specializes in start-up and early stage investments. The fund seeks to invest in unlisted companies, with a focus on companies in the science, technology, and engineering sectors. It targets investments in companies located in the United Kingdom, approximately within 60 miles of Oxford. The fund typically invests between £0.1 million ($0.15 million) and £0.5 million ($0.76 million).
General.Address: Oxford Technology Management, Oxford, United Kingdom, OX4 4GA
